name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通能力，經由美國實境電視節目與合宜的活動設計，如小組討論具有深度與實用性的議題，使學生獲得充分機會來演練英語聽講的技巧以及適切的表達方式。
schedule:
01  Introduction
02  AP1: Summer of Sam’s Club
03  Games 1
04  AP2: The Razor’s Edge
05  [Special Activities]
06  Games 2
07  AP3: Get it in Gear
08  Games 3
09  MIDTERM
10  AP4: Cereal Killer
11  [Special Activities]
12  Games 4
13  AP5: Cruise Control 
14  Games 5
15  AP6: King of the Jingle
16  Games 6
17  FINAL
18  FINAL (extra)
scorePolicy:
1) Group discussion/report               30%
2) Game Designing and Leading            10%
3) Mideterm + Final (Individual)         60%
4) Spontaneous Q & A in class            Bonus points
materials:
1. Videos of ”The Apprentice” Series
2. Handouts of (1) important expressions extracted from the videos    and (2) discussion questions related to the contents of the episodes
3. American Colloquialisms and Slang (book)
